product_name: SportHill Dash Half-Zip Top - Men's - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Supersoft and comfy like your favorite T-shirt, but light in weight and heavy on performance, the SportHill Dash Half-Zip Top is great as a stand-alone piece or a base layer for running.
short_description: Supersoft and comfy like your favorite T-shirt, but light in weight and heavy on performance, the SportHill Dash Half-Zip Top is great as a stand-alone piece or a base layer for running.
